attributes.action: restrict new housing in south due to water shortages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that new housing should be restricted in the South until the water companies can guarantee that they will be able to supply existing homes plus all new builds

rejection.details:
This issue is covered in:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Save-Essex/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
